meanings.definition: The state or quality of being frothy.
meanings.sent1: The frothinesses of the milk made it perfect for cappuccinos.
meanings.sent2: The beer's frothinesses added to its appeal.
meanings.sent3: The frothinesses of the bubble bath made bath time more fun.
meanings.sent4: Her excitement had a frothinesses that bubbled over.
meanings.sent5: The frothinesses of the ocean waves was mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having a light, bubbly texture.
meanings.sent1: The cake's frothinesses made it a hit at the party.
meanings.sent2: The frothinesses of the whipped cream made the dessert delightful.
meanings.sent3: The frothinesses of the clouds made them look like fluffy pillows.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter had a frothinesses that lifted everyone's spirits.
meanings.sent5: The frothinesses of the soap bubbles delighted the children.

meanings.definition: The tendency to produce foam or bubbles.
meanings.sent1: The detergent's frothinesses made washing dishes easier.
meanings.sent2: The shampoo's frothinesses ensured a thorough clean.
meanings.sent3: The frothinesses of the soda made it fizzy and refreshing.
meanings.sent4: His storytelling had a frothinesses that captured everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: The frothinesses of the fountain added a playful touch to the garden.
